title: Age Calculator
outline: Web app that allows you to calculate your age based on the date of birth you provide.

title: Minesweeper
outline: Puzzle game that involves clearing a minefield without detonating any hidden mines.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
outline: Responsive App of the famous rock paper scissors game.

title: iPhone Note
outline: Web app clone that allows users to create and save their notes on the local storage. This app provides a seamless and intuitive experience.

title: Playstation website clone
outline: The PlayStation Clone website aims to replicate the design and functionality of the official PlayStation website.

title: Tip Calculator
outline: An app that calculates the appropriate tip amount and total bill per person when dining out.

title: Fishing Shop
outline: Web App where you can drag and drop fishes from the counter to the scale, and the price will be calculated accordingly.

title: Cocktails Maker
outline: Web app that allows users to search, discover, and view a collection of cocktail recipes. The application offers an animation of the cocktail's composition.

title: Pokedex App
outline: Comprehensive online encyclopedia for Pokémon trainers. It provides a user-friendly interface to explore and discover information about various Pokémon species.

title: Spotify Web
outline: Static version of Spotify. I did it during my study of Bootstrap and responsive design practice project.

title: Rugby Website
outline: Clone website useful to test more advanced CSS in the match cards section and to practice with fetch to JSON file.

title: Drumpad
outline: App that allows you to play drum sounds by clicking on virtual pads. It provides a fun and interactive way to create beats and experiment with different drum sounds.

title: Words Game
outline: Web-based game that tests your typing skills by challenging you to correctly type a given word within a certain time limit.
